Interface ComponentFramework

  • All Superinterfaces:
    space.arim.universal.util.Stringable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    JsonComponentFramework
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Component, Component.Builder, ComponentBuilder, JsonComponent, JsonComponent.Builder, JsonComponentBuilder

    public interface ComponentFramework
extends space.arim.universal.util.Stringable
    Contains common documentation for Component and ComponentBuilder
    Author:
    A248

    • Method Detail

      • getText

        String getText()
        Gets the content of the Component
        Returns:
        the string content, never null

      • getColour

        Colour getColour()
        Gets the colour
        Returns:
        the colour, null indicates not set

      • hasColour

        default boolean hasColour()
        Checks whether a colour is set
        Returns:
        true if the Component has a colour, false otherwise

      • getStyles

        Style[] getStyles()
        Gets the styles on the Component.
        The result is a copy; modifying it will not modify the Component's styles.
        Returns:
        the styles, empty for none set

      • hasStyle

        default boolean hasStyle(Style style)
        Checks whether the specified style is set
        Parameters:
        style - the style to check for
        Returns:
        true if the style is set, false otherwise

      • toStringMe

        default String toStringMe()
        Specified by:
        toStringMe in interface space.arim.universal.util.Stringable
